name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Sales Engineer with 13+ years of experience in enterprise monitoring and event management, specializing in delivering high-performance SaaS applications. Proficient in **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**, with hands-on expertise in monitoring tools such as **Nagios**, **Datadog**, and **Splunk**. Strong background in leveraging **Python** and **JavaScript** for effective communication and presentation to stakeholders. Experienced in managing complex network environments and utilizing tools like **ServiceNow** and **Jira** for streamlined operations. 
Demonstrated ability in building AI/ML-powered platforms that enable predictive analytics and automation, and implementing cloud-native systems with a focus on compliance using HIPAA and PCI DSS standards. Recognized for skill in developing both frontend and backend solutions using frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, and proficient in deploying microservices and event-driven architectures. Well-versed in MLOps practices including model training and orchestration with **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
